title: FS/FT Best Offer: 4 now 3 Two Namers Different Top and Bottom

posts.post_title: FS/FT Best Offer: 4 now 3 Two Namers Different Top and Bottom
posts.post_content:
Over the last few years I have run across these 4 two namers. I am looking for an offer on these as I am not certain how to price them. I know there are some true collectors out there for these and hope they have an interest. 

I have them posted in the one card/two name thread with better scans. The four cards are:

McGraw-Chesbro Post 84 with factory designation on top**SOLD**
Oakes-Easterly Post 85
Livingstone-Maloney Post 28
Egan-Warhop Post 100 (sliver compared to the other 3)

Please PM for better scans if needed.

Thank you
Still looking for best offer individual or group
Still looking for a best offer for the lot
